message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $9,500. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only comfortable paying $9,000 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $9,000. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $9,250?
